Entries.Linus: Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -Castiel %item object 136 1 143 1 202 1 227 1 228 1 %%[#]A Gift From Castiel
Entries.LinusCooking: @,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -Castiel%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Castiel's Recipe
Entries.fall_8_1: Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -Castiel%item quest 107 %%[#]Castiel Lost His Basket
Entries.passedOut2: @, ^You're lucky I found you last night! You were unconscious, and someone was searching your pockets. I have no idea how much money they took... they ran away as soon as I approached. Be more careful!^^-Castiel[#]Note From Castiel
Entries.linusTrashCleanup: Hi @,^^Thanks for helping me clean up around the valley.^The waters are looking much cleaner. I think everyone will appreciate it. I know I will.^As a way of saying 'thanks', I wanted to teach you how to grow your own fiber. I hope it's useful.^^-Castiel%item craftingRecipe Fiber_Seeds %%[#]Castiel's Thank You

Entries.summer_Tue6: I feel bad for Castiel. People judge him, but he's just living a different lifestyle.$u#$e#I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others.

Entries.18: When I first arrived, Castiel made me a suit out of leaves, like his...#$b#But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango!$h#$e#I think I'll stick to my feathers.
Entries.Wed: Between Castiel and Miss Penny, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.
Entries.4: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Castiel told me it was a hot-air balloon!$u#$b#I thought only birds could fly...
Entries.Fri: Castiel has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here!$h#$e#Though... I do kind of miss having golden walnuts for breakfast every morning...$s
Entries.winter_Fri: Castiel taught me how to make a special spice berry rubbed fish...#$b#He says if I eat enough of it it'll keep me warm this winter!$h
Entries.Fri8: Castiel says I should 'cook' my fish before eating it...$s#$b#I'm having a hard time getting used to it... so dry...$s

Entries.winter_Fri2: Are you friends with Castiel? He lives in a tent up in the mountains.#$e#Everyone ignores him, the poor guy. He's actually really nice... Just a little odd.#$e#It must be so cold to live in a tent this time of year.

Entries.Linus: A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean.$h

Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Linus: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You're lucky I happened to pass by!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s

Entries.774: Wild Bait/15/-300/Basic -21/Wild Bait/A unique recipe from Castiel that gives you a chance to catch two fish at once.

Entries.107: LostItem/Blackberry Basket/It's blackberry season, but Castiel can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is./Find Castiel's basket and return it to him./Linus 790 Backwoods 27 27/-1/0/-1/true/My basket! Thank you. This means a lot to me.$h

Entries.Linus_Text: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?                   -Castiel

Entries.Linus: I'd join in... but I don't think I'm welcome.$s
Entries.Leo: Castiel feels uncomfortable about joining in, so I'm going to keep him company.#$e#We'll have our own little feast... mashed winter root and spice berry fish!$h

Entries.Linus: Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.#$e#That was many years ago.$h#$e#An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.
I'll just sneak up when the jellies arrive... I don't want to bother anyone.

Entries.Maru: Whatever Castiel is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.Linus: A slow, continuous rotation is key to achieving the perfect roast.
Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.#$b#Spring is almost over... what a shame.
No one really talks to me... I just come for the deviled eggs.
Entries.Linus_y2: I'll just slip in a little later and have some food. I'm eyeing that scrumptious looking pie!

Entries.Linus: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.
